summary: This is an email chain between U.S. Attorney's Office staff regarding a public records request for the Epstein file. The sender asks whether to respond to a letter not citing FOIA and inquires about follow-up from Mr. Edwards. The recipient notes they were on military leave and will process the request.

persons.name: Mr. Edwards
persons.context: Mentioned as someone from whom a response to correspondence is awaited.

events.title: Military Leave
events.description: The email recipient was on military leave during these dates, delaying the processing of a records request.

keyFacts: A public records request was made for the entire Epstein file from the U.S. Attorney's Office in October 2008.
The request letter was addressed to the 'Records Custodian' and did not reference the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA).
The office was awaiting a response from a Mr. Edwards regarding prior correspondence.
Processing of the request was delayed because a staff member was on military leave from October 22-26, 2008.
